review: As much as I wanted to love this thing (it's so cool, right?), I just don't.  It was awesome the first few months I had it.  I got a great deal on it since I am a Prime member.  However, after awhile, it stopped loading the shows.  On both Prime and Netflix.  It would load the menu then just give up.  I had to switch to a Wi-Fi enabled blu-ray player.  That hasn't given me as many problems as the Fire Stick.  Sorry, Amazon.  I love you, but this one was not so good.
author: Caitlin Malk

review: Perhaps I'm just clueless on this one, but I was expecting to be able to search across all platforms like I can with my Roku. Am I doing something wrong here?When I attempt to search for something, it only searches Amazon Prime content, and not Netflix or Hulu. And yes, I did add the apps and login to them.Aside from that, it's not a bad deal. The picture quality seems to have improved on my television, and the navigation is not bad. I like it. I was just expecting the ability to do a little more than I seem to be able to do with it.
author: Charles
